alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 08 at 11:08AM AKDT until April 09 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 11 inches highest amounts East Anchorage/Eagle River/Hillside. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The low density snow will easily blow around and reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of light snow will continue over Anchorage through Saturday. The west side of the Bowl might see a slight reprieve this afternoon and evening as drier air filters in from the northwest; however, east Anchorage, the Hillside and Eagle River/Glenn Highway corridor will likely see an uptick in intensity during the late evening. A second wave of snow will rotate through Sunday morning and continue into the afternoon before tapering off by Sunday evening. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov. &&
